description.value: A staple for every room on many starships, a standard emergency kit contains basic first aid and disaster preparedness supplies including one @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.wKVMw34GyIVXXs0w]{mk 1 serum of healing}, four @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.KDkXSPZXelOYqNfW]{energel food pellets} (Galaxy Exploration Manual 40), four packs of water, a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.GcFU8g4cqpZlU1dG]{standard battery}, and a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.Wn8wvrMD7xtQD7hU]{flashlight}.
